channel.title: Slimmed Down GitHub YAML Updates
channel.description: A feed of updated YAML files from GitHub

item.title: October 2024: Updated Rules (Part 1/1)
item.description:
Updated rules for October 2024:
Name: MFA Spamming followed by Successful login (1.0.4)
ID: a8cc6d5c-4e7e-4b48-b4ac-d8a116c62a8b

Name: Admin promotion after Role Management Application Permission Grant (1.1.0)
ID: f80d951a-eddc-4171-b9d0-d616bb83efdc

Name: Potential Fodhelper UAC Bypass (1.0.2)
ID: 56f3f35c-3aca-4437-a1fb-b7a84dc4af00

Name: Possible SignIn from Azure Backdoor (1.0.0)
ID: fa00014c-c5f4-4715-8f5b-ba567e19e41e

Name: Non Domain Controller Active Directory Replication (1.0.4)
ID: b9d2eebc-5dcb-4888-8165-900db44443ab

Name: Credential added after admin consented to Application (1.1.1)
ID: 707494a5-8e44-486b-90f8-155d1797a8eb

Name: Suspicious application consent for offline access (1.0.2)
ID: 3533f74c-9207-4047-96e2-0eb9383be587

Name: SecurityEvent - Multiple authentication failures followed by a success (1.0.7)
ID: cf3ede88-a429-493b-9108-3e46d3c741f7

Name: Authentication Attempt from New Country (1.1.2)
ID: ef895ada-e8e8-4cf0-9313-b1ab67fab69f

Name: NRT Microsoft Entra ID Hybrid Health AD FS New Server (2.0.3)
ID: ec491363-5fe7-4eff-b68e-f42dcb76fcf6
